welcome: Hi, and welcome to ***DUNGEONS OF DISCORD***. Press :raising_hand: to join, and :white_check_mark: to start.
tooSmall: You can't send nobody on a quest! I don't count!
tooLarge: Too many people! I can't count higher than 3!
notOnQuest: You can't start a quest if you're not on it! Unless you're a king or queen or something.
letsRock: , welcome! Ready to rock? Yeah? Alright, let's do it!
